item.title: Supply and Demand : The Crazy Price of NICs
item.description: Ok, so I want to have my own ESXi host at home. Initially it may sound like a tall order but there are lots of good community sites out there describing how to do it and what works and what doesn’t. www.vm-help.com has a very good HWCL on it compiled from user experience. So after trying and failing to install ESXi 4.1 I found on vm-help that my motherboard’s on-board NIC isn’t compatible as there are no drivers on the installation CD for it.
